events.message: Customer reported a collision involving their vehicle on the highway around 7 AM, initiating the claim process.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident due to car collision on public road.
A dedicated claims agent was assigned promptly to handle the accident case and coordinate with the customer.
Customer received an official acknowledgment confirming that their auto accident claim has been logged.
Agent requested official police report, photos of damaged vehicle, and insurance policy documents for investigation.
Customer submitted all required documentation including photos, police report, and repair estimates promptly.
The investigation team began evaluating the accident circumstances and examining submitted evidence.
Investigation concluded confirming liability and extent of damage consistent with the customer's report.
A settlement offer was proposed to cover the repair costs and associated expenses related to the car accident.
Customer provided positive feedback expressing satisfaction with the prompt response and proposed settlement.
The claim approval was finalized following customer acceptance of the settlement proposal.
Payment for the approved settlement was successfully processed and transferred to the customerâ€™s bank account.
The insurance claim was officially closed after confirmation of payment receipt and customer satisfaction.
All documentation and records related to the auto accident claim have been securely archived for future reference.
